name: Catar-se
description:
Inputs:

WASD or Arrows: Walk

Spacebar (Hold): Pickup trash or push cart

Game developed during #GameJamXboxTeams, the theme was "Invisible People".

We tried to have a social approach, and wanted to put the player behind the wheels of an invisible person, to the eyes of the society.

Catar-se (from Portuguese, to "Carry oneself", a metaphor as you are seem as disposable, the same as the things you pick up for them) is a contemplation experience. Live the life of a street cleaner, where your only partner is your trash cart, and experience the invisibiliity for one day of work.
